detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract UVO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#88-211) has payable functions:
	 - UVO.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#200-202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [UVO](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#L88-L211) has payable functions:
	 - [UVO.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#L200-L202)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable UVO._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UVO.sol#94) is not in mixedCase
